okio.Buffer

      Buffer BufferedSource.buffer()
      Returns this source's internal buffer.
      Buffer BufferedSink.buffer()
      Returns this sink's internal buffer.
      Buffer Buffer.buffer() 
      Buffer Buffer.clone()
      Returns a deep copy of this buffer.

      Buffer Buffer.writeUtf8(String string) 
      Methods in okio with parameters of type Buffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long Source.read(Buffer sink, long byteCount)
      Removes at least 1, and up to byteCount bytes from this and appends them to sink.

      long GzipSource.read(Buffer sink, long byteCount)

      Removes exactly byteCount bytes from this and appends them to sink.
